synopsis: Yuuko, a teenage girl, wishes for nicer clothes to impress the boy she likes. Kaori is faced with family problems while feeling lonely. Michiyo's crush transferred schools without ever noticing her, leading her to question her tomboyish looks. These girls seemingly have nothing in common, until all three come into possession of a beautiful one-piece dress. But is the dress just an innocent gift, or is there something more sinister at play?
